video.title: League of Super Evil
video.synopsis: Armed with a whole new approach to badness, the League of Super Evil (a.k.a. L.O.S.E.) follows four Super Villains who have set their sights on nothing less than total neighborhood domination!

episodes.synopsis: Two ladies give the gang a hard time: Lightning Liz, who crashes their party, and the Cougar, a villain with her sights set on a bank vault and Red.
episodes.title: Lightning Liz / The Bank Job

episodes.synopsis: The team combats their archenemy, gung-ho officer Justice Gene. / L.O.S.E. battles a snooty host who refuses to let them dine at a new restaurant.
episodes.title: Justice Gene / Table for 4

episodes.synopsis: Voltar and his pals plan to steal a freeze ray. / While trying to score a free pizza, the guys are thwarted by a super speedy delivery guy.
episodes.title: Escape from Skullossus / 10

episodes.synopsis: The L.O.S.E. crew ramps up the competition when Voltar cheats at basketball with the local kids. / Doomy tries to out-evil a bunny in a pet contest.
episodes.title: Slam Dunked / Evil-est in Show

episodes.synopsis: Frogg's tinkering with the Lair's security system goes awry, as does Voltar's scheme to steal a shark to protect the gang's new swimming pool.
episodes.title: LOSE vs LAIR / Swimming with Shark

episodes.synopsis: Nanny Boo Boo arrives at the lair and battles with Voltar for leadership of the gang. / The guys are desperate to buy the fabulous new iDestruct.
episodes.title: Rock-a-Bye Voltar / iDestruct

episodes.synopsis: Voltar plots to steal all the television channels in the world. / Using a stolen dinosaur bone, the League attempts to clone a Tyrannosaurus rex.
episodes.title: One Zillion / Bite at the Museum

episodes.synopsis: The team tries to beat legendary racer Doom Driver. / Frogg's birthday party turns into a disaster when his very first evil invention shows up.
episodes.title: Full Throttle / Happy Birthday Dear Doktor

episodes.synopsis: The L.O.S.E. crew must deal with a former enemy who hopes to become bad. / The boys create clones of themselves to do their chores.
episodes.title: Injustice Gene / Send in the Clones

episodes.synopsis: Frogg tries to brainwash people into liking frozen tofu instead of his favorite ice cream. / After Voltar quits, Frogg takes charge of the team.
episodes.title: Ice Creamed / The Split

episodes.synopsis: Education is the name of the game when Voltar poses as a substitute teacher. / Frogg uses electric shocks to teach Red to be more evil.
episodes.title: School Daze / Bad-O-Meter

episodes.synopsis: Voltar makes a big mistake when he says no to a little girl selling cookies. / The evil team has a terrible day while trying to enjoy a movie.
episodes.title: Suzie Scouts / At the Movies

episodes.synopsis: Red must decide between becoming an accordion star and his devotion to the team. / The League replaces the old henchbots with expensive new models.
episodes.title: Not Accordion to Plan / The Henchbots Elites

episodes.synopsis: Frogg becomes the object of affection for a lonely monster. / The League scrambles to obtain their Villain Team drivers' licenses.
episodes.title: Mr. and Mrs. Bandango / Driver's Evil Ed

episodes.synopsis: Evil elf Kinder Creep targets the gang for impersonating him, and the naughtiness continues when Voltar tries to outwit a guessing game at the mall.
episodes.title: The Night Before Chaos-mas / Counting on Victory

episodes.synopsis: Voltar is even more cranky than usual when he keeps getting crummy fortune cookies. / Voltar attempts to break a world record in pogo stick jumping.
episodes.title: Fortune's Fools / World Wreckers

episodes.synopsis: Doomageddon has a bad tooth, but the veterinarian is afraid to go near him. / The disappearance of Voltar's lucky underwear leads to a sinister plot.
episodes.title: Lose Tooth / Underwhere?

episodes.synopsis: Red secretly mentors a young boy in the ways of evil. / Voltar has a trick up his sleeve when he challenges neighborhood kids to a street hockey game.
episodes.title: Lose Junior / The League of Super Hockey

episodes.synopsis: Voltar tries to spread evil with an antisleep ray. / Do-gooder Capt. Glory becomes the League's archenemy.
episodes.title: Evil Never Sleeps / Glory Hog

episodes.synopsis: Frogg's attempt to scare his pals by pretending to be a ghost backfires. / The gang's fake diplomas lead to an encounter with a mutant guinea pig.
episodes.title: Past Due / Degrees of Evil

episodes.synopsis: The guys have their hands full while trying to overcome some seriously crunchy chips. / Red tries to collect enough hair to summon the Hair Fairy.
episodes.title: 20,000 Crunches Under the Sea / Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: The League runs afoul of Skullossus when his robotic suit falls into Voltar's hands. / The League must restore their reputation for doing evil deeds.
episodes.title: Vollossus / No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: Frogg creates a colossal and always-hungry playmate for Doomy. / Voltar embarks on an evil shampoo-stealing rampage at the Metrotown Hotel.
episodes.title: Franken-Blecch / Room for Four

episodes.synopsis: On Henchman Appreciation Day, Red is declared leader of L.O.S.E. for a day. / Frogg invents a machine that turns his brains into brawn.
episodes.title: Red Menacing / Dr. Strong Frogg

episodes.synopsis: Voltar throws a fit when he's not invited to a birthday party. / Conflict ensues when a parallel version of the League moves into the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Party Pooper / A LOSE/LOSE Situation

episodes.synopsis: Incensed by a crank call from Voltar, alien emperor Humungo travels to Earth demanding an apology. / Humungo conspires to take over the universe.
episodes.title: Dial E for Evil / Voltar Squared
